name: RainSounds
0:
”Alexa, open Rain Sounds”
”Alexa, start Rain Sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain sounds
des:
This Skill is your best source for rain sounds and videos on Alexa. By default, relaxing rain sounds play for 2 hours. You can also upgrade the experience to get a lot more.

PREMIUM FEATURES:
=========================
[+] 8 additional rain sounds
[+] runtime up to 12 hours to let sounds play throughout the night
[+] higher audio quality for crystal clear sound
[+] gentle audio fade-out: Premium sounds gently fade out to silence starting 30 minutes before end. It can prevent sleep interruptions which may result from abruptly stopping audio.

VIDEO FEATURES:
=========================
On screen devices, this Skill also offers dozens of stunning background videos to help you relax, sleep, focus, and de-stress.

VOICE COMMANDS (while audio plays):
=========================
- "Alexa, next" to go to the next rain sound
- "Alexa, go back" to return to the previously heard rain sound
- "Alexa, loop" to start playing audio for 12 hours
- "Alexa, loop off" to return to playing audio for 2 hours
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
